data.message:
Hey Facebook, I just realized that all photos I had been tagged in on other peoples pages, prior to the day I changed my name to "Al Kohler" from Allan Scott Kohler," are no longer linked to my account! I want to change it back and put (Al Kohler) as my AKA - your program will not process my request though so my AKA is (Allan Scott Ko...hler)!

FB Tip for the day: Don't change your name HAHAHAHAHA
